GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.title: Sweet potato & butternut squash soup with lemon & garlic toast
articles.body: Roast your vegetables in honey before blitzing into this velvety smooth, spiced soup - served with garlicky, zesty ciabatta slices for dipping
articles.author: weegembump

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Increments the vote count on specified article. Can be positive or negative increment. Serves updated article. Accepts patch in format below

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds new comment to database when posted in the format below. Serves posted comment
POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.restrictions: must be valid username and object keys as below
